Features.title:
We built this for the love of
The Deen. (Preserving Knowledge)
Features.description: Everything a student needs to read, memorize, and master the Mutuun. Streamline your Hifdh journey with powerful, modern tools.
Features.footer: Iqraa offers comprehensive tools for students of all levels.

verifiedLibrary.title: Verified Library
verifiedLibrary.description: Access digitised classical texts with verified Tahqiq, not just scanned PDFs.

aiTasmi.title: AI Tasm'i
aiTasmi.description: Recite to the app. It listens, corrects mistakes, and tracks your fluency.

smartSrs.title: Smart SRS
smartSrs.description: Spaced Repetition System that ensures you review lines right before you forget them.

contextualSharh.title: Contextual Sharh
contextualSharh.description: Click any verse to instantly see explanations from scholars like Ibn Uthaymeen.

audioSync.title: Audio Sync
audioSync.description: Listen to world-renowned reciters synced line-by-line with the text.

hifdhCircles.title: Hifdh Circles
hifdhCircles.description: Join virtual circles with friends to track progress and keep each other accountable.

progressAnalytics.title: Progress Analytics
progressAnalytics.description: Visualize your memorization strength with heatmaps and retention charts.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Start reading on your laptop, continue memorizing on your phone. Always synced.
